column4: Frustrating! Biden campaigned on closing the racial wealth gap -- a job the OCC has just completely failed at. Why not reset the tone by appointing Mehrsa Baradaran, a highly qualified woman of color, who just happens to be a leading expert on the fixing that gap? https://t.co/Y8RBnRccIF

Michael Barr has impeccable credentials and is highly regarded, there's nothing overtly wrong with this choice. But this administration needs to avoid the trap of defaulting to previous experience, which will always favor white men.
